title: Atom Auto Complete
description: Tailwind CSS Autocompletion provider for Atom
author: Vincent Klaiber / @vinkla

title: Tailwind CSS IntelliSense
description: Tailwind CSS class name completion for VS Code
author: Brad Cornes / @bradlc

title: Tailwind CSS Autocomplete
description: Tailwind CSS class name completion for Sublime Text
author: Brad Cornes / @bradlc

title: Tailwind CSS Cheatsheet
description: Cheat sheet to search the Tailwind CSS utility classes and CSS properties

title: Refactor CSS
description: Helps you identify reoccurring CSS class name combinations in your markup

title: Sketch Tailwind
description: Export aspects of a design made in Sketch into Tailwind CSS ready javascript files
author: Jan DH / @jan-dh
